title: Government Supporting Community Accessibility Initiatives (Nova Scotia Department of Community Services)
text: ( Source : Nova Scotia Department of Community Services ) Government is supporting efforts to make an elementary school playground in Timberlea , Halifax Regional Municipality , more accessible. Timberlea-Prospect MLA Iain Rankin , on behalf of
